definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The children's department also will feature new signs to direct shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 同時，兒童服裝部也將製作新的導購標誌。

sentences.english: Every sell-conductor here can say at least three of four languages.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏的導購員，每人至少都會三四種外語。

sentences.english: Purchasing Guide is needed in the aspects.
sentences.chinese: 導購員必需在這方面下功夫。

sentences.english: I'll send up the concierge , he can arrange a personal shopper for you.
sentences.chinese: 我會讓禮賓部來爲你安排私人導購。

sentences.english: A personal shopper pulls imperfect red grapes from a bunch. She is bagging for a customer.
sentences.chinese: 一名導購員將不好的紅葡萄揪下，她正在給顧客裝袋。

sentences.english: We are in urgent need of excellent shop assistants.
sentences.chinese: 我們急需優秀的導購員。

sentences.english: Shopping guide for advice in buying a pair of shoes very Zhongyi satisfactory home.
sentences.chinese: 在導購的建議下買了一雙十分鐘意的鞋滿意的回家了。

sentences.english: Therefore Purchasing Guide can use a variety of techniques, but will never be able to cheat customers.
sentences.chinese: 因而導購員能夠運用各類技巧，但毫不能夠詐騙顧客。

definition: open shelves (in self-service store or user access library)
replacement guaranteed if not genuine/fig. authentic
nothing for nothing/you get what you pay for
pinyin: yi1 fen1 qian2 yi1 fen1 huo4

definition: pervert (esp. one who gropes women in public)
